Text.p: Larger, more popular version of the Cobra Mk I (the Mk II only reached prototype stage and was abandoned due to a design fault in the hull; it was not convex). This ship is equipped with several special features, including Zieman Energy Deflection Shields, fore and aft, and mountings for four Ingram Pulse lasers. The Cobra is much favored by lone-wolf traders who wish to combine potential superior combat qualities with adequate cargo space.
